name: Evry Charecter Fused
description: sometimes, i wonder, what is the point of making this game? after all, it's not like in the future this game will be relevant, and besides, there's going to be an end to this game sometime. so what's the point? i could go on and on about why i think it's pointless to work on this game, but it isn't worth it. i guess, i think it's my passion project, i wanna do good, y'know? spooky and funky don't necessarily update this game often, and i feel like... without me, the game wouldn't be where it is today, not to brag though. i mean, we're almost to 1000 objects, and it MIGHT be 1000 objects depending on when you're reading this.
